sys_script.name: Update Lager

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_526619_mensaapp_bestellungen</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update Lager</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {


    //     var gaproduct = new GlideRecord('x_526619_mensaapp_produkte');
    //     gaproduct.addQuery("sys_id", "=", current.getValue("produkt"));
    //     gaproduct.query();

    //     if (gaproduct.next()) {
    //         var price = gaproduct.getValue("preis");
    //     }

    //     var ergebnis = price * current.getValue("menge");

    //     current.endpreis = ergebnis;
    // current.update();

    var gaproduct = new GlideRecord('x_526619_mensaapp_produkte');
    gaproduct.addQuery("sys_id", "=", current.getValue("produkt"));
    gaproduct.query();

    if (gaproduct.next()) {

        var ergebnis = gaproduct.getValue("lager") - current.getValue("menge");
        gaproduct.setValue("lager", ergebnis);
		gaproduct.update();
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-27 11:57:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>07a8b087077690101af9f9fc7c1ed01d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Lager</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="MensaApp" source="x_526619_mensaapp">d7b08cc32fb29010e4c854492799b626</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MensaApp">d7b08cc32fb29010e4c854492799b626</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_07a8b087077690101af9f9fc7c1ed01d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-27 11:57:02</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=07a8b087077690101af9f9fc7c1ed01d"/></record_update>
